title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For a correct expression for the energy of a photon

E = hf OR E = hc/λ

Substituting into the second equation

E = (1.99 x 10-25 J⋅m) / (450 x 10-9 m) OR (1.24 x 103 eV⋅nm) / (450 nm)

1 point is earned: For the correct answer with units

E = 4.4 x 10-19 J (or 2.8 eV)
descriptions:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For a correct relationship for the number of photons N

N = (energy emitted in 5 minutes) / (energy per photon)

1 point is earned: For correct substitutions

N= (power)(time) (energy per photon) = (2.5× 10−3 J/s)(5 min)(60 s/min) / 4.4× 10−19 J

1 point is earned: For the correct answer

N = 1.7 x 1018
descriptions:

N = 1.7 x 1018

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For relating the maximum kinetic energy of an electron to the stopping potential (i.e., 0.86 eV or qV)

1 2 m v max 2 =qV MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaaca aIXaaabaGaaGOmaaaacaWGTbGaamODamaaDaaaleaaciGGTbGaaiyy aiaacIhaaeaacaaIYaaaaOGaeyypa0JaamyCaiaadAfaaaa@4008@

1 point is earned: For obtaining the correct expression for the maximum speed

v max =  2qV/m v max =  2( 1.6×1 0 −19  C )( 0.86V )/( 9.11×1 0 −31  kg ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@653B@

1 point is earned: For the correct answer with units

vmax = 5.5 x 105 m/s

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned: For a correct relationship for the wavelength

λ = h P max λ = h m v max λ =  6.63× 1 0 34  J⋅s ( 9.11×1 0 −31  kg )( 5.5×1 0 5  m/s ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@@7202@

1 point is earned: For the correct answer with units

λ = 1.3 nm
